00003 import java.util.Vector;

00005 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00006 import newtonERP.orm.Orm;
00007 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00008 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00010 
00015 public class GroupsRight extends AbstractOrmEntity
00016 {
00017         private static Right rightDefinition;
00018 
00021         public GroupsRight()
00022         {
00023                 rightDefinition = new Right();
00024                 setVisibleName("Droit de groupe");
00025         }
00026 
00031         public GroupsRight(Groups groups, Right right)
00032         {
00033                 int groupsIdValue = groups.getPrimaryKeyValue();
00034                 int rightIdValue = right.getPrimaryKeyValue();
00035 
00036                 getFields().setData("groupsID", groupsIdValue);
00037                 getFields().setData("rightID", rightIdValue);
00038         }
00039 
00040         public Fields initFields()
00041         {
00042                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldsInit = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00043                 fieldsInit.add(new FieldInt("Numéro de groupe", "groupsID"));
00044                 fieldsInit.add(new FieldInt("Numéro de droit", "rightID"));
00045                 return new Fields(fieldsInit);
00046         }
00047 
00053         public Groups getGroupsEntity()
00054         {
00055                 Groups groupsDefinition = new Groups();
00056 
00057                 Vector<String> search = new Vector<String>();
00058                 search.add(groupsDefinition.getPrimaryKeyName()
00059                                 + getFields().getField(groupsDefinition.getPrimaryKeyName()));
00060 
00061                 // todo: correct deprecate
00062                 return (Groups) Orm.select(new Groups(), search).get(0);
00063         }
00064 
00070         public Right getRightEntity()
00071         {
00072                 String rightIDValue = getFields().getField("rightID").getDataString();
00073 
00074                 Right rightSearchEntity = new Right();
00075                 rightSearchEntity.getFields().setData(
00076                                 rightDefinition.getPrimaryKeyName(), rightIDValue);
00077 
00078                 return (Right) Orm.select(rightSearchEntity).get(0);
00079         }
00080 }
